401.title: 401: Authorization required
401.description: Oops! It seems you've encountered an access barrier. Make sure you're authenticated correctly to access this area.

403.title: 403: Forbidden page
403.description: Oops! It seems you've not permissions to access this page.

404.title: 404: The page you are looking for isn’t here
404.description: You've attempted to access an incorrect route or arrived here by mistake. Whatever the case, try using the navigation.

410.title: The page you are looking for isn’t here
410.description: You've attempted to access an incorrect or expired route.

500.title: 500: Internal Server Error
500.description: Oh no! Our servers seem to be having a rough day. Don't worry, we're busy resolving this technical issue.

validations.string: This field should be an alphanumeric text.
validations.number: This field should be a number.
validations.stringOrNumber: This field should be a text or number.
validations.formatEmail: This field should be a valid email.
validations.charExceded: This field should be less than {{maxChars}} characters.
validations.file-invalid-type: This selected file type is not allowed.
validations.fileTypeMustBeCsv: This selected file type is not allowed. Must be a .csv file.
